long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kano is a free browser extension that provides users with an easy way to view, switch between, filter, remove, and reorder their open tabs. It allows users to manage their tabs efficiently and makes it easier to stay organized while browsing. Kano does not require registering an account, and it does not transmit any data to external applications or services.

Features:
★ View open tabs in a comprehensive list
★ Close duplicate tabs
★ Filter tabs by title
★ Rearrange tabs using drag-and-drop
★ Rearrange tabs using move to top & move to bottom buttons
★ Move tabs to a new window
★ Close individual tabs or multiple tabs at once

https://github.com/bitfoot/kano
